borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: 10001	Platanus x hispanica (London Plane)	RVL - Remove faulted limb / limbs, long, contorted (anthracnose) massaria branch approximately 8m agl SW over mulched area, back to approx. 1m from union, retaining epicormic growth at that point and both historic, decayed wounds for habitat value.10958	Prunus domestica (Plum) - RS00 - Reduce faulted stem / stems by - Specified extent	to clear broken section and tidy wound as necessary.10544	Aesculus hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) - RL00 - Reduce faulted limb / limbs by - Specified extent limb over road approx 7m agl north with torsional crack damage, to retain approximately 2m with furnishing growth (3-4 side branches) to minimise visual impact. Works recommended to manage risk of harm or damage through branch failure on to road due to torsional cracking through vertical branch.10704	Aesculus hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) - RH00 - Reduce height - Specified extent	to approximately 1m.10447	Acer pseudoplatanus (Sycamore) - R00 - Reduce crown by -  Specified extent height and branch length by approx. 2 m to minimise risk of branch failure and encourage new growth, remove deadwood.10738	Acer negundo (Box Elder (Ash - Leaved) Maple)	R00 - Reduce crown by -  Specified extent	height and branch length by approx. 1m to encourage new growth - retrenchment pruning - intending to establish a smaller crown and aid tree longevity. Remove deadwood.10072	Tilia x vulgaris (Common Lime) - PRT - Prune from adjacent tree to reduce/remove small branch conflict creating bark damage. Final cuts <2cm diameter.10794	Eucalyptus  sp. (Eucalyptus Tree) - Prune from adjacent structure to clear fencing by 1-2m, removing whole branch where appropriate.10821	Aesculus hippocastanum (Horse Chestnut) - Lift low canopy - Pedestrian clearance to 2.5m - 3 m above car parking.10680	Cupressocyparis leylandii (Leyland Cypress) FLH - Fell - Retain high stump due to poor physiological condition and evident...(CONTINUED ON APPLICATION FORM)
